TopicTitle: Want more LF tanks for your nuclear engines?

Articles.Content:
Here's some Module Manager code for you:

+PART[*]:HAS[@RESOURCE[Oxidizer],@RESOURCE[LiquidFuel]]
{
    @name ^=:$:-lfonly
    @title ^=:$: (LF Only)
    @description ^=:$: (LiquidFuel only version)
    @RESOURCE[LiquidFuel]
    {
        @amount /= 0.45
        @maxAmount /= 0.45
    }
    !RESOURCE[Oxidizer] {}
}
